statement.p: Explain why the vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -4 \\ -25 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 29 \\ 1 \\ 50 \\ 28 \end{array}\right] span or don't span \mathbb{R}^4.

answer.p: The vectors \left[\begin{array}{r} -5 \\ -5 \\ -5 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ -5 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -16 \\ -4 \\ -25 \\ -12 \end{array}\right] , \text{ and } \left[\begin{array}{r} 29 \\ 1 \\ 50 \\ 28 \end{array}\right] do not span \mathbb{R}^4.
